Config_file_example
===================
This is a simple example for the Config_script of a Laval rotor

    :language: matlab
    :linenos:
    :start-after: Rotor
    :end-before: Sensors

    :end-before: Components

    :language: matlab
    :linenos:
    :start-after: Components
    :end-before: Loads

    :end-before: PID-controller

    :language: matlab

    :end-before: Active Magnetic Bearing

    :language: matlab

    :start-after: Active Magnetic Bearing
